org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler

Interface IRecipeDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<IRecipeDefinition>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeDefinition

    public interface IRecipeDefinition
extends java.lang.Comparable<IRecipeDefinition>
    Defines the inputs and outputs of a recipe. Inputs are ingredient prototypes for ingredient component types. Outputs are exact instances for ingredient component types. Implementing classes should properly implement the equals and hashCode methods.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputComponents

        java.util.Set<IngredientComponent<?,?>> getInputComponents()
        Returns:
        The input ingredient component types.

      • getInputs

        <T,M> java.util.List<IPrototypedIngredientAlternatives<T,M>> getInputs(IngredientComponent<T,M> ingredientComponent)
        Get the input prototypes of a certain type. The first list contains a list of ingredients, whereas the deeper second list contains different prototype-based alternatives for the ingredient at this position.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The instance type.
        M - The matching condition parameter, may be Void.
        Parameters:
        ingredientComponent - An ingredient component type.
        Returns:
        Input prototypes.

      • getOutput

        IMixedIngredients getOutput()
        Returns:
        The output ingredients.

      • serialize

        static net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound serialize(IRecipeDefinition recipe)
        Deserialize a recipe to NBT.
        Parameters:
        recipe - A recipe.
        Returns:
        An NBT representation of the given recipe.

      • deserialize

        static RecipeDefinition deserialize(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deserialize a recipe from NBT
        Parameters:
        tag - An NBT tag.
        Returns:
        A new mixed recipe instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given tag is invalid or does not contain data on the given recipe.
